description.short: 3-Way Convertible Gown with premium lace and structured satin.
description.full:
Pricing & Availability

  • Made to Order: ₱12,000
  • Made to Rent available

Details

  • Style: 3-Way Convertible Gown
  • Fabric: Premium Lace & Structured Satin

Features

  • Sweetheart neckline with detachable lace sleeves.
  • Inner lace sheath with a stylish front slit.
  • Detachable structured satin overskirt for a grand trail.
  • Classic lace-up corset back for an adjustable fit.

Note

Since the sleeves and the skirt are both removable, you can actually style this in three ways: the full gown, the sheath with sleeves, or the strapless sheath.

description.short: Classic regal ballgown with premium satin and customizable trail length.
description.full:
Pricing & Availability

  • For Sale: ₱16,000
  • Open for Rental
  • Made to Rent available

Details

  • Style: Classic Regal Ballgown
  • Fabric: Premium Satin
  • Color: Pure White
  • Design: Timeless and structured silhouette
  • Size: Small to Medium (Onhand) | Custom size available

Features

  • Sweetheart neckline with a wrap-around pleated bodice for a sophisticated look.
  • Classic puff sleeves that add a touch of vintage-inspired romance.
  • Full, voluminous ballgown skirt that flows into a grand, sweeping trail.
  • Customizable Trail Length: For Made to Order (MTO) and Made to Rent, the trail length can be changed to suit your preference.
  • Clean, polished aesthetic perfect for a traditional cathedral or modern hotel wedding.
  • Adjustable back to ensure a flawless fit.

description.short: Strapless mermaid gown with premium floral lace and sheer tulle.
description.full:
Pricing & Availability

  • For Sale: ₱10,500
  • Open for Rental

Details

  • Style: Strapless Mermaid / Sheath
  • Fabric: Premium Floral Lace & Sheer Tulle
  • Design: Not two-way
  • Size: XS only

Features

  • Boning-defined corset bodice for a structured, snatched silhouette.
  • Elegant draped hip detailing that flows into a delicate lace skirt.
  • Sheer lace overlay featuring intricate floral patterns.
  • Perfect for garden and intimate weddings.
  • Includes matching pearl necklace accessory for a timeless look.

description.short: Ballgown with leaf embroidery and versatile multi-way silhouette.
description.full:
Pricing & Availability

  • For Sale: ₱15,500
  • Open for Rental (Shop display)
  • Made to Rent available

Details

  • Style: Ballgown
  • Fabric: Premium Textured Tulle & Intricate Leaf Embroidery
  • Design: Versatile Multi-way silhouette
  • Size: Small to Medium (Onhand)

Features

  • Plunging V-neckline with a sheer modesty insert for a modern, romantic touch.
  • Exquisite leaf and floral lace appliqués cascading beautifully from the bodice to the skirt.
  • Full, voluminous tulle skirt that holds its shape beautifully even without a petticoat.
  • Detachable tulle shoulder ribbons for an ethereal, customizable look.
  • Adjustable back to ensure a snug and flattering fit.

description.short: Romantic A-line with exquisite all-over floral lace and long sleeves.
description.full:
Pricing & Availability

  • For Sale: ₱15,000
  • Open for Rental
  • Made to Order available
  • Made to Rent available

Details

  • Style: Romantic A-Line
  • Fabric: Exquisite All-over Floral Lace
  • Weight: Lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear
  • Design: Versatile silhouette that can be worn with or without a petticoat
  • Size: Small to Medium (Onhand)

Features

  • Sweetheart corset bodice with built-in cups and delicate eyelash lace trim.
  • Intricate floral lace overlay cascading from the bodice down to the scalloped hemline.
  • Elegant long lace sleeves for a classic, sophisticated bridal look.
  • Adjustable lace-up back to ensure a perfectly cinched and customized fit.
  • Graceful floor-length skirt that maintains a beautiful shape with minimal effort.

description.short: Minimalist regal ballgown with premium matte satin and functional pockets.
description.full:

  • Made to Rent available

Details

  • Style: Minimalist Regal Ballgown
  • Fabric: Premium Matte Satin
  • Color: Sophisticated Ivory
  • Design: Timeless and structured
  • Size: Medium to Large (Onhand)

Features

  • Sweetheart neckline with elegant pleated off-shoulder sleeves.
  • Structured corset bodice that provides a clean, tailored silhouette.
  • Full box-pleated ballgown skirt with a dramatic 1.5m trail.

description.short: Romantic A-line with French lace and versatile multi-way design.
description.full:
Pricing & Availability

  • Made to Order: ₱12,999
  • Made to Rent available

Details

  • Style: Romantic A-line
  • Fabric: Delicate All-over French Lace
  • Design: Versatile multi-way look
  • Size: Custom size

Features

  • Structured corset bodice with visible boning and a scalloped lace neckline.
  • Softly pleated A-line skirt that flows into a graceful floor-length finish.
  • Detachable draped off-shoulder sleeves for two distinct bridal looks.
  • Intricate lace craftsmanship perfect for vintage-themed or classic ceremonies.
  • Headpiece and veil are not included.
